cooking_method: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Grill chicken.Simmer tomatoes and spices in butter. Add cream and cooked chicken.Serve with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and tomato in oil.Add spinach and spices.Purée mixture.Cook paneer in sauce. Serve with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and spices in oil. Add chickpeas and tomatoes. Simmer until thickened.Garnish with coriander. Serve with rice or naan.
Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Grill chicken. Sauté onion and spices in oil. Add tomatoes and cream. Add cooked chicken. Serve with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and spices in oil. Add potatoes and cauliflower.Simmer until tender. Garnish with coriander. Serve with rice or naan.
Soak lentils and beans overnight. Boil lentils and beans with spices.Add tomatoes and cream. Simmer until thickened. Serve with rice or naan.
Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.  Grill or bake chicken.  Simmer tomato, cream, butter, and spices.  Add cooked chicken.  Serve with rice or naan.
Marinate paneer in yogurt, spices, lemon juice, and ginger garlic paste. Grill or bake paneer.  Serve with mint chutney.
